data.title: Spring of the First Dewdrop Locations and How to Use
data.meta_description: Spring of the First Dewdrop is a Fontaine Local Specialty material used to ascend Navia in Genshin Impact. See where to find all locations of these dewdrops, how to use, and where to buy it here!
data.meta_site_name: Game8ï½œThe Top Gaming and App Walkthroughs Straight from Japan!
data.text:
Spring of the First Dewdrop is a Fontaine Local Specialty material used to ascend Navia in Genshin Impact. See where to find all locations of these dewdrops, how to use it, and where to buy it here!

Spring of the First Dewdrop Location

Spring of the First Dewdrop Locations Map

Found in Morte Region

Spring of the First Dewdrop can be found amidst the waters of Morte Region! Some are even hidden inside giant clam shells that you hit to open. This region is part of the Version 4.2 map expansion for Fontaine!

Morte Region Location Guide

Make Use of Character Farming Passive

Fontaine Local Specialty Markers Lyney

Lyney's Passive, Trivial Observation, displays the location of nearby specialties unique to Fontaine on the mini-map!

List of Fontaine Local Specialties

Spring of the First Dewdrop Shop

Buy Spring of the First Dewdrop from Pahsiv's Shop

You can buy 15 Spring of the First Dewdrop for two pieces of Tidalga from a Melusine vendor named Pahsiv in her shop inside a cave in Loch Urania.

You can only access her shop after completing the Wild Fairy of Erinnyes questline. If you have, you can find the entrance to her location beside the waterfall north of the lake!

Note that this shop does not refresh. Once you get these dewdrops you can't buy them again!

Pahsiv Shop Location Guide

Spring of the First Dewdrop Respawn Time

Respawn Time is 48 Hours

As with other Local Specialties, Spring of the First Dewdrop reset exactly 48 hours after you collect them. Relog the game or teleport from the farthest waypoint and check the location once more to see it respawn.

Check out other player's worlds

If you're already out of Spring of the First Dewdrops in your world, you can try asking other Travelers in Co-op mode!

Genshin Co-Op Boards Friend Request Board Co-Op Board Supporting Cast Board

How to Use Spring of the First Dewdrop

Used to Ascend Navia

Spring of the First Dewdrop x60

Spring of the First Dewdrop is used to ascend Navia to her next ascension level. You must collect 168 of these special dewdrops to ascend her to the maximum level.

How to Ascend Characters

Spring of the First Dewdrop Information

What are Spring of the First Dewdrops?

Spring of the First Dewdrop Rarity 1 Type Materials Effect None

The universe is a dark and cold place.

But look carefully. Inside are always faint glimmers of light, like pearls gleaming from within the sand, splinters of diamond sprinkled over asphalt, lights lancing through the fog on a misty night, and sparks that ignite the brightest blazes.

Genshin Impact Related Guides
